Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><PlanName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><Storage class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><RetentionPeriod class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">30</RetentionPeriod><BackupFrequency class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">1 days</BackupFrequency><StartTime class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">21:00</StartTime><CompanyName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: CreatePlan
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><EpochStartTime class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">75600</EpochStartTime><RPOInMinutes class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">1440</RPOInMinutes><RPODescription class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Everyday at 21:00</RPODescription><RPOFrequencyType class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Daily</RPOFrequencyType><EpochEndTime class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">86340</EpochEndTime><FrequencyInterval class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">1</FrequencyInterval><FrequencyRecFactor class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">1</FrequencyRecFactor><DedupFlags class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><OrganizationId class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /></variables>

inputs.val:
<inputs><request><url>/v2/Plan</url><method>POST</method><postType>Raw</postType><postContent>{
  "plan": {
    "summary": {
      "plan": {
        "planName":"xpath:{/workflow/inputs/PlanName}"
      },
      "type": "MSP",
      "subtype": "Server",
      "description": "xpath:{/workflow/inputs/PlanName}",
      "planOwner": {
        "userId": xpath:{/workflow/system/executor/userId}
      },
      "restrictions": 1,
      "rpoInMinutes": xpath:{/workflow/variables/RPOInMinutes},
      "slaInterval": 0,
      "addons": {
        "database": true,
        "snap": true,
        "filesystem": true
      }
    },
    "options": {
      "quota": 0
    },
    "schedule": {
      "task": {
        "taskFlags": {
          "disabled": false,
          "isEZOperation": false,
          "isEdgeDrive": false
        },
        "taskType": "SCHEDULE_POLICY"
      },
      "subTasks": [
        {
          "subTask": {
            "subTaskName": "Incremental backup schedule",
            "subTaskId": 1,
            "subTaskType": "BACKUP",
            "operationType": "BACKUP",
            "flags": 65536
          },
          "pattern": {
            "name": "Incremental backup schedule",
            "freq_type": "xpath:{/workflow/variables/RPOFrequencyType}",
            "freq_interval": xpath:{/workflow/variables/FrequencyInterval},
            "freq_recurrence_factor": xpath:{/workflow/variables/FrequencyRecFactor},
            "freq_subday_interval": 0,
            "active_start_date": 0,
            "active_start_time": xpath:{/workflow/variables/EpochStartTime},
            "active_end_time": xpath:{/workflow/variables/EpochEndTime},
            "active_end_occurence": 0,
            "timeZone": {
              "TimeZoneID": 1001,
              "TimeZoneName": "Client Time Zone"
            },
            "description": "xpath:{/workflow/variables/RPODescription} "
          },
          "options": {
            "backupOpts": {
              "backupLevel": "INCREMENTAL",
              "dataOpt": {
                "daysBetweenSyntheticBackup": 0
              },
              "runIncrementalBackup": true,
              "incLevel": "BEFORE_SYNTH",
              "isSpHasInLineCopy": false,
              "doNotTruncateLog": false,
              "sybaseSkipFullafterLogBkp": false,
              "runSILOBackup": false
            }
          }
        },
        {
          "subTask": {
            "subTaskName": "Synthetic Fulls",
            "subTaskId": 1,
            "subTaskType": "BACKUP",
            "operationType": "BACKUP",
            "flags": 0
          },
          "pattern": {
            "name": "Synthetic Fulls",
            "freq_type": "Automatic_Schedule",
            "freq_recurrence_factor": 0,
            "freq_subday_interval": 0,
            "active_end_time": 0,
            "timeZone": {},
            "description": "Based on automatic schedule settings"
          },
          "options": {
            "backupOpts": {
              "backupLevel": "SYNTHETIC_FULL",
              "dataOpt": {
                "createNewIndex": true,
                "followMountPoints": true,
                "useCatalogServer": true,
                "enforceTransactionLogUsage": false,
                "skipConsistencyCheck": false,
                "useMultiStream": true,
                "useMaximumStreams": true,
                "maxNumberOfStreams": 1,
                "autoCopy": true,
                "daysBetweenSyntheticBackup": xpath:{/workflow/inputs/RetentionPeriod}
              },
              "vsaBackupOptions": {
                "backupFailedVMsOnly": false
              },
              "runIncrementalBackup": false,
              "incLevel": "NONE",
              "doNotTruncateLog": false,
              "truncateLogsOnSource": false
            },
            "commonOpts": {
              "automaticSchedulePattern": {
                "minBackupInterval": 0,
                "minBackupIntervalMinutes": 15,
                "maxBackupInterval": 72,
                "maxBackupIntervalMinutes": 0,
                "minSyncInterval": 0,
                "minSyncIntervalMinutes": 0,
                "wiredNetworkConnection": {
                  "enabled": false
                },
                "specfificNetwork": {
                  "enabled": false,
                  "ipAddress": {
                    "address": "0.0.0.0",
                    "subnet": 24
                  }
                },
                "acPower": {
                  "enabled": false
                },
                "stopIfOnBattery": {
                  "enabled": false
                },
                "minNetworkBandwidth": {
                  "enabled": false
                },
                "newOrModifiedFile": {
                  "enabled": false
                },
                "stopSleepIfBackUp": {
                  "enabled": false
                },
                "ignoreOpWindowPastMaxInterval": true
              }
            }
          }
        }
      ]
    },
    "storage": {
      "copy": [
        {
          "StoragePolicyCopy": {
            "copyName": "Primary"
          },
          "copyType": "SYNCHRONOUS",
          "isDefault": "SET_TRUE",
          "active": "SET_TRUE",
          "extendedFlags": {	
            "useGlobalStoragePolicy": "SET_TRUE"
          },
          "retentionRules": {
            "retentionFlags": {
              "enableDataAging": "SET_TRUE"
            },
            "retainBackupDataForDays": xpath:{/workflow/inputs/RetentionPeriod},
            "retainArchiverDataForDays": -1
          },
          "useGlobalPolicy": {
            "storagePolicyName": "xpath:{/workflow/inputs/Storage}"
          },
          "dedupeFlags": {
            xpath:{/workflow/variables/DedupFlags}
          }
        },
        {
          "copyType": "SNAP",
          "isDefault": "SET_FALSE",
          "isSnapCopy": "SET_TRUE",
          "active": "SET_TRUE",
          "retentionRules": {
            "retentionFlags": {
              "jobBasedRetention": "SET_TRUE"
            },
            "retainBackupDataForDays": 15,
            "retainBackupDataForCycles": 1,
            "retainArchiverDataForDays": -1,
            "jobs": 8
          },
          "copyPrecedence": 1
        }
      ],
      "enableBackupCopy": true
    },
    "laptop": {
      "content": {
        "backupContent": [
          {
            "subClientPolicy": {
              "backupSetEntity": {
                "backupsetName": "Windows subclient policy"
              },
              "subClientList": [
                {
                  "commonProperties": {
                    "storageDevice": {
                      "softwareCompression": "USE_STORAGE_POLICY_SETTINGS",
                      "deDuplicationOptions": {
                        "enableDeduplication": true,
                        "generateSignature": "ON_CLIENT"
                      }
                    },
                    "readBuffersize": 512,
                    "numberOfBackupStreams": 4
                  },
                  "content": [
                    {
                      "path": "\\"
                    }
                  ],
                  "contentOperationType": "OVERWRITE",
                  "fsSubClientProp": {
                    "useVSS": true,
                    "useVSSForSystemState": true,
                    "backupSystemState": false,
                    "backupSystemStateforFullBkpOnly": false,
                    "keepAtLeastPreviousVersions": 5,
                    "catalogACL": true,
                    "scanOption": "OPTIMAL_SCAN"
                  }
                }
              ]
            },
            "idatype": 2
          },
          {
            "subClientPolicy": {
              "backupSetEntity": {
                "backupsetName": "Linux subclient policy"
              },
              "subClientList": [
                {
                  "commonProperties": {
                    "storageDevice": {
                      "softwareCompression": "USE_STORAGE_POLICY_SETTINGS",
                      "deDuplicationOptions": {
                        "enableDeduplication": true,
                        "generateSignature": "ON_CLIENT"
                      }
                    },
                    "readBuffersize": 512,
                    "numberOfBackupStreams": 4
                  },
                  "content": [
                     {
                      "path": "/"
                    }
                  ],
                  "contentOperationType": "OVERWRITE",
                  "fsSubClientProp": {
                    "useVSS": true,
                    "keepAtLeastPreviousVersions": 5,
                    "catalogACL": true,
                    "scanOption": "RECURSIVE_SCAN"
                  }
                }
              ]
            },
            "idatype": 3
          },
          {
            "subClientPolicy": {
              "backupSetEntity": {
                "backupsetName": "Mac subclient policy"
              },
              "subClientList": [
                {
                  "commonProperties": {
                    "storageDevice": {
                      "softwareCompression": "USE_STORAGE_POLICY_SETTINGS",
                      "deDuplicationOptions": {
                        "enableDeduplication": true,
                        "generateSignature": "ON_CLIENT"
                      }
                    },
                    "readBuffersize": 512,
                    "numberOfBackupStreams": 4
                  },
                  "content": [
                    {
                      "path": "/"
                    }
                  ],
                  "contentOperationType": "OVERWRITE",
                  "fsSubClientProp": {
                    "useVSS": true,
                    "keepAtLeastPreviousVersions": 5,
                    "catalogACL": true,
                    "scanOption": "RECURSIVE_SCAN"
                  }
                }
              ]
            },
            "idatype": 4
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "database": {
      "scheduleLog": {
        "task": {
          "taskName": "Log schedule policy for the database clients",
          "taskFlags": {
            "isEdgeDrive": false
          },
          "policyType": "DATA_PROTECTION",
          "taskType": "SCHEDULE_POLICY",
          "description": "Automatic schedules for the log backup"
        },
        "appGroup": {
          "appGroups": [
            {
              "appGroupId": 13,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_Sybase"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 114,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_POSTGRES"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 129,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_SAP_HANA"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 100,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_MySql"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 11,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_DB2"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 111,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_INFORMIX"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 101,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_SAP_FOR_ORACLE"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 90,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_SQL_POLICY"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 83,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_AppTypeIndexedBased"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 12,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_NotesDb"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 10,
              "appGroupName": "PACKAGEGRP_DB"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 10,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_ORACLE"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 14,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_XchangeDB"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 104,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_NotesDb_Transaction_Log"
            },
            {
              "appGroupId": 134,
              "appGroupName": "APPGRP_DISTRIBUTEDAPPS"
            }
          ]
        },
        "subTasks": [
          {
            "subTask": {
              "subTaskName": "Incremental automatic schedule for logs",
              "subTaskType": "BACKUP",
              "operationType": "BACKUP",
              "flags": 65536
            },
            "pattern": {
              "freq_type": "Automatic_Schedule",
              "timeZone": {}
            },
            "options": {
              "backupOpts": {
                "backupLevel": "INCREMENTAL",
                "dataOpt": {
                  "followMountPoints": true,
                  "useCatalogServer": true,
                  "enforceTransactionLogUsage": false,
                  "skipConsistencyCheck": false,
                  "autoCopy": false,
                  "daysBetweenSyntheticBackup": 7
                },
                "oracleOptions": {
                  "backupArchLogOptions": {
                    "backupArchiveLogCriteria": "ALL",
                    "startLSN": 1,
                    "endLSN": 1,
                    "backupArchiveLog": true
                  },
                  "deleteArchLogOptions": {
                    "backupArchiveLogCriteria": "NONE"
                  }
                },
                "runIncrementalBackup": true,
                "incLevel": "BEFORE_SYNTH",
                "cumulative": false,
                "doNotTruncateLog": false,
                "sybaseSkipFullafterLogBkp": false,
                "truncateLogsOnSource": false,
                "distAppsBackupOptions": {
                  "runDataBkp": false,
                  "runLogBkp": true
                }
              },
              "commonOpts": {
                "perfJobOpts": {},
                "automaticSchedulePattern": {
                  "minBackupInterval": 0,
                  "minBackupIntervalMinutes": 15,
                  "maxBackupInterval": 4,
                  "maxBackupIntervalMinutes": 0,
                  "logPercent": {
                    "enabled": true,
                    "threshold": 80
                  },
                  "logFileNum": {
                    "enabled": true,
                    "threshold": 50
                  },
                  "diskUsedPercent": {
                    "enabled": true,
                    "threshold": 80
                  },
                  "useStorageSpaceFromMA": false,
                  "sweepStartTime": 86400
                }
              }
            }
          }
        ]
      },
      "slaInMinutes": 240,
      "rpoInMinutes": 240
    },
    "inheritance": {
      "isSealed": true
    },
    "snapInfo": {
      "noOfRecoveryPoints": 8,
      "snapToTapeSchedule": {
        "subTask": {
          "subTaskName": "Snap to tape",
          "subTaskType": "ADMIN",
          "operationType": "SNAP_TO_TAPE",
          "flags": 0,
          "subTaskOrder": 0
        },
        "pattern": {
          "name": "Automatic backup copy",
          "freq_type": "After_Job_Completes",
          "freq_interval": 240,
          "freq_recurrence_factor": 1,
          "active_start_time": 79200,
          "timeZone": {
            "TimeZoneName": "Client Time Zone"
          }
        },
        "options": {
          "backupOpts": {
            "backupLevel": "NONE",
            "mediaOpt": {
              "markMediaFullOnSuccess": false,
              "startNewMedia": false,
              "auxcopyJobOption": {
                "autoCopy": true
              }
            },
            "dataOpt": {
              "daysBetweenSyntheticBackup": 0
            },
            "runIncrementalBackup": true,
            "isSpHasInLineCopy": false,
            "doNotTruncateLog": false,
            "sybaseSkipFullafterLogBkp": false,
            "runSILOBackup": false
          },
          "adminOpts": {
            "snapToTapeOption": {
              "allowMaximum": true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
</postContent><postContentType>application/json; charset=UTF-8</postContentType><headers><name>Authtoken</name><value>QSDKONLY xpath:{/workflow/system/token}</value></headers><headers><name>Accept</name><value>application/json</value></headers><headers><name>operatorCompanyId</name><value>xpath:{/workflow/variables/OrganizationId}</value></headers></request></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="String start_time = xpath:{/workflow/inputs/StartTime};
String frequency = xpath:{/workflow/inputs/BackupFrequency}.toLowerCase();
if(frequency.contains("days"))
{
 String[] time = start_time.split(":");
 int hrs = Integer.parseInt(time[0]);
 int mins = Integer.parseInt(time[1]);
 int secs = hrs*3600 + mins*60;
 String epoch = secs + "";
 String[] days = frequency.split(" ");
 String rpo = (Integer.parseInt(days[0])*24*60) + "";
 String desc = "Every day at "+ start_time;
 workflow.setVariable("RPOInMinutes",rpo);
 workflow.setVariable("EpochStartTime",epoch);
 workflow.setVariable("RPODescription",desc);

}
else
{
 String[] hours = frequency.split(" ");
 String mins = Integer.parseInt(hours[0])*60 + "";
 workflow.setVariable("RPOInMinutes",mins);
 workflow.setVariable("RPODescription","Continous schedule after 240 minutes");
 workflow.setVariable("RPOFrequencyType","After_Job_Completes");
 workflow.setVariable("EpochStartTime","0");
 workflow.setVariable("EpochEndTime","0");
 workflow.setVariable("FrequencyInterval","240");
 workflow.setVariable("FrequencyRecFactor","0");
}
" /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val: <inputs><commCell /><query>Select name from archGroup where id=(Select attrVal from app_planprop where  componentNameId=(select id from app_plan where name='xpath:{/workflow/inputs/PlanName}') and attrName = 'Storage policy')</query></inputs>

<inputs><inputXml class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"><App_UpdateStoragePolicyCopyReq>
	<storagePolicyCopyInfo>
		<StoragePolicyCopy>
			<copyName>Primary</copyName>
			<storagePolicyName>xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_2/resultSets/row/col}</storagePolicyName>
		</StoragePolicyCopy>
		<copyFlags>
			<switchIfOffline>1</switchIfOffline>
			<switchIfBusy>2</switchIfBusy>
			<roundRobbinDataPath>0</roundRobbinDataPath>
		</copyFlags>
		<dataPathConfiguration>
			<resourcesOfflineWaitTimeInHoursMinutes>
				<hours>0</hours>
				<minutes>0</minutes>
			</resourcesOfflineWaitTimeInHoursMinutes>
			<resourcesBusyWaitTimeInHoursMinutes>
				<hours/>
				<minutes/>
			</resourcesBusyWaitTimeInHoursMinutes>
		</dataPathConfiguration>
	</storagePolicyCopyInfo>
</App_UpdateStoragePolicyCopyReq></inputXml><escapeXml class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</escapeXml><commandArgs class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><sessionOptions class="workflow.types.cmd.SessionOptions" _list_="false"><useImpersonatedAccount class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</useImpersonatedAccount><tokenFile class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><token class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></sessionOptions></inputs>
